entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing NativeAOT accidently includes any .dll next to .csproj as a FrameworkAssembly #77757
  • Setting the TCP keep alive for an HttpClient should be significantly simpler #77755
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedElementAt, Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedFindIndex #77754
  • Setting NullabilityInfoContextSupport=false in NativeAOT doesn't remove NullableAttribute/NullableContextAttribute ctors #77753
  • Need way to exclude specified assemblies from automatic loading via the dependency file and not bypass AssemblyResolve #77751
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException helper methods #77749
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot doesn't warn for base/override annotation mismatch on generic virtual methods #77744
  • Make Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.CopyTo public #77743
  • ReadyToRun: How to detect target compilation platform ? #77742
  • Clean-up gtGetLclVarName and gtDispLclVar #77741
    Future
  • [release/7.0] WBT tests disabled, till a new sdk is available #77740
  • Replace native `ComWrappers` implementation with NativeAOT version #77738
    Future
  • Cipher suite not enabled even though being explicitly set/provided. #77752
  • It is recommended that BinaryWriter and BinaryReader add support for large terminal read/write methods #77736
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Accurately log catastrophic test failures and freezes in source-gened test infrastructure #77735
    8.0.0
  • [Test failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #77726
    8.0.0
  • The "Collection was of a fixed size." exception when configuring options. #77725
  • Unable to build: Unable to load Analyzer assembly #77723
  • "unmanaged memory" issue with dotnet 6 #77722
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount is broken for numbers with a lot of trailing zeros. #77720
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 16 Regressions on 10/25/2022 7:09:53 PM #77732
  • Regressions from Array.Initialize change #77730
  • [API Proposal]: Linq CountBy method #77716
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonReader.TryCopyString #77714
  • [libraries-pgo arm32] Failure in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.AggregateExceptionTests.Flatten #77710
    8.0.0
  • Setting `RunAOTCompilation=true` on non-wasm/non-mobile projects fails to build #77707
    8.0.0
  • Delete HNDTYPE_WEAK_NATIVE_COM when no longer needed. #77703
    Future

Closed

  • NET-6 - Error on loading default value of My.Settings #74528
    Future
  • [Proposal] Add string.RemoveCharacters(string) #41287
    Future
  • SetTcpKeepAlive() is a no-op #77758
  • System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource: Activity with null operation name #77621
    8.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfoTests.ConvertTimeFromToUtc_UnixOnly test fails around DST change #77648
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in IndexOf #54165
    8.0.0
  • Serialization.Formatters.Tests - numerous failures with server GC #58642
    8.0.0
  • Audit and cleanup the generic math API docs #69694
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Bmi2 - ADCX and ADOX instructions missing. #72423
    Future
  • Convert.ChangeType does not work with DateOnly #73074
    Future
  • Edge case issue with System.Numerics.BigInteger #77081 #77729
  • RFC: MARK in Regular Expressions #25431
    Future
  • [wasm] `browser-eventpipe` sample broken with `PerfTracing` build - `JSExportAttribute' is only supported on: 'browser'` #77630
    8.0.0
  • Tracing a very simple .NET 6 Android app with AOT shows calls to RuntimeHelpers.CompileMethod #77479
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json #77731
  • System.Drawing enumerations cause CA1416 errors when a project compiled against .NET 7 RC2 #77248
    8.0.0
  • [Test failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #77724
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 8 Regressions on 10/25/2022 10:16:52 PM #77546
  • For HttpClient with HttpMessageHandler is getting called multiple times for single SendAsync #77495
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding #68405
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding with nested types and readonly properties not working #77677
    8.0.0
  • Test failure R2R-CG2 windows arm64 Checked @ Windows.10.Arm64v8.Open JIT\\jit64\\mcc\\interop\\mcc_i17\\mcc_i17.cmd #77662
  • [API Proposal]: ring buffer #77718
  • [wasm] ManagedError constructor has significant overhead due to reading Error.stack #77473
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/Desktop/boxunboxvaluetype_do/boxunboxvaluetype_do.sh #77706
  • RyuJIT: Extend "cns".Length optimization to support static readonly fields #42087
    8.0.0
  • Bound checks for static readonly arrays #76578
    8.0.0
  • Serialized type name decoder and encoder for SR.Metadata #27288
    Future
  • ECMA metadata document inaccurate or bugged #28442
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Incorrect CodeView type information emitted for enums #77564
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT x86: improve localloc codegen in some cases #6546
    Future
  • Use "DOTNET_EnableCrashReport" create report, but "*.crashreport.json" file was not found #77671
    8.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler is inconsistent with header value trimming on HTTP/1.1 #77001
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[wasm] browser profiler (#77449)" #77759
    test-failure, arch-wasm, blocking-clean-ci, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize XxHash3 #77756
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 6.0.12 #77750
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable phi-based jump threading when SSA updates aren't needed #77748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: increase edge weight slop tolerance some more #77747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77734
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug with BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount #77727
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Support profiles with only histograms #77721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #77709
    area-Interop-mono
  • Control if invalid configuration values are swallowed or thrown #77708
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fixing a logging bug when a single non-object array is cast to object[] #77702
    area-Extensions-Logging

Merged

  • Fix Activity.OperationName when Activity is created with null value #77746
    breaking-change, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 8.0.0
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo test failure #77745
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77682
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update the Nuget Config used for Maui net6 apps. #77739
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add readmes for configuration packages, part 1 #77733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixing VarLocInfo on JITDUMP #77700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] browser profiler #77449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update SuperPMI artifact logging #77685
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #77704
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Run dotnet-format for ThunkGenerator #77715
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update some documentation #77711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve WoA workflow documentation #77691
    area-Meta
  • First pass at adding a test to reproduce the problem. #77693
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Avoid running R2RDump if crossgen2 failed #77705
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update a few dependencies #77678
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold bound checks for static readonly arrays/strings #77593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a bit of dead code #77655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add doc describing well-known properties that the host can pass to the runtime #76732
    area-Host
  • [NativeAOT] Don't generate extra structure record in debugging information for enums #77684
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `MetaDataTracker` #77701
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Mark and expose additional Vector functions as Intrinsic #77562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #77549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, blocking, 7.0.x
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update release/7.0 Perf infrastructure to use Perf repo release/7.0 branch #77699
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Added ConnectionString Support for Extra Azure Service Connection Types #77670
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #77125
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] Free `LOADERHANDLE` `DispatchMemberInfo` dtor #77570
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.1
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy constructor selection #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77388
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.1
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • Optimize ManagedError ctor and (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
